translation.global.title: Gen Studio
translation.global.claim: Select an image to enter the AI studio
translation.map.title: Gan
translation.map.description: Based on given artworks from The Met’s Open Access collection, a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) allows you to explore and visualize the spaces in between those pieces.
translation.map.explore: Click or drag to explore the space between them
translation.map.combine: Explore the space between existing objects
translation.foo.desc: Gen Studio is a prototype concepts which was created over a two-day hackathon with collaborators across The Met, Microsoft, and MIT.
